name: CallistasPaintingMix-1.0
description:
Reuploading now that I have permission from dream labs to mix their model into mine. Thanks to them.

This is a mix of three models. DreamShaper, Luna's Angels- A realism model with Ethnicity support, and DreamlabsOil_v2

I have found that this blend works well with EnvyBetterHands LoCon

I use it for oil portraits and while there is nsfw data in the model and that improves human subjects generated, I do not primarily use it for that.

Suggested settings:

  • Sampling Method: Euler A

  • Sampling Steps: 25

  • Hires. Fix Upscaler: R-ESGAN 4x+

  • Hires Steps: 20

  • CFG Scale: 8

  • Width: 512

  • Height: 712

  • Denoise Strength: 0.3

meta.prompt: oil on canvas, (absurdres, highres, ultra detailed), Victorian,  ((Best quality)), ((masterpiece)), ((realistic)), Transcendent  femininity,  ethereal grace, masterpiece, high quality, love, hope, grace,   <lyco:GoodHands-beta2:1.0>
